title: MOTD generator
original_prompt: Create a random,catchy/pop-culture type of MOTD for my gaming server
input1: "Welcome to the realm of epic battles and legendary loot! 🌟 Join us in our quest to conquer the leaderboard and claim your throne! Remember, in this world, every day is a new adventure—let's make it legendary! 🎮✨"
input2: "Attention, warriors! ⚔️ The arena is calling! Gather your allies and prepare for the ultimate showdown! Don't forget to check out our new skins and power-ups—because who doesn't want to look fabulous while dominating? 💥👑"
input1_ans: "🎉 Welcome to the Pixelated Playground! 🌈 Where every respawn is a chance for glory! 💥 Gather your squad, channel your inner hero, and let’s level up together! Remember, in this game, the only limit is your imagination! 🚀 Game on, legends! 🏆"

"Attention, brave warriors and server legends! 🎮 Are you ready to dive into a world where every pixel counts and every battle could be your last? Join us on our gaming server, where the loot is legendary and the competition is fierce! 🏆 Gear up, gather your squad, and let’s turn those epic battles into unforgettable memories! Remember, in this realm, the only limit is your imagination—let’s make every day an adventure worth telling! 🌟🔥"
input2_ans: "🎮 Level Up, Legends! 🌟 The battle for glory is on! Assemble your squad and dive into epic quests that would make even the Avengers jealous! 💥✨ New loot drops and exclusive skins await—because style points matter! Are you ready to claim your throne? 🏆🔥"

"Hey, gamers! 🎮 Ready to level up your game? The battlefield is buzzing, and it's time to rally your squad for an epic clash! 💥 Dive into our latest skins and power-ups—because slaying foes in style is the only way to go! Are you in? Let’s make some legendary memories! 🏆🔥"
